# FastroAI Documentation

**Complete AI stack: FastAPI + AstroJS + PydanticAI. Auth, payments, AI agents pre-built.**

FastroAI gives you everything you need to build and ship profitable AI applications. This documentation teaches you how to build profitable AI applications using FastroAI - from problem identification to production deployment.

!!! tip "New to AI applications?"
    Start with our [Learning Path](learn/index.md) to build your first AI application from scratch using real-world examples.

!!! success "Just want to get started?"
    Skip the theory and [Get FastroAI Running](getting-started/index.md) in 5 minutes. Understand how it works later.

## Why FastroAI?

**Save months of development time.** Instead of building authentication, billing, and AI infrastructure from scratch, focus on your actual AI application.

**Revenue potential.** Each month you delay building your AI application costs an average of $15K in missed revenue. FastroAI gets you to market in days, not months.

**Complete stack.** Everything you need to build, deploy, and monetize AI applications:

!!! info "What's Included"

    :material-check:{ .green } **AI Agents** - PydanticAI integration with memory management, usage tracking, and tool integration  
    :material-check:{ .green } **Authentication System** - JWT + OAuth 2.0 ready with Google/GitHub login  
    :material-check:{ .green } **Payment Processing** - Complete Stripe integration with subscriptions and credits  
    :material-check:{ .green } **Entitlement System** - Tier-based access control for any business model  
    :material-check:{ .green } **Full-Stack Ready** - FastAPI backend + AstroJS frontend  
    :material-check:{ .green } **Production Ready** - Monitoring, background tasks, admin interface, testing suite

---
